sql.sql:
select
    r.code "code",
    r.name "name",
    p.code "parentCode",
    r.groupfl
from u_uz_oked r, u_uz_oked p
where r.arcfl='0' and r.id_hi=p.id(+)
    and (
        :code is not null and r.code=:code and r.groupfl=0
        or
        :code is null and (
            json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.code.filter') is null 
                and json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.name.filter') is null
                and (
                    :parentCode is null and p.code is null
                    or
                    :parentCode is not null and p.code = :parentCode
                )
            or    
            json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.code.filter') is not null 
                and r.code like '%%'||json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.code.filter')||'%%'
                and r.groupfl=0
                
            or
            json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.name.filter') is not null 
                and upper(r.name) like '%%'||upper(json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.name.filter'))||'%%'
                and r.groupfl=0
        )
    )
order by r.code
